ItemDescription.SourceString: Hitting an enemy with this weapon has a small chance to cause it and nearby enemies to dance and take fire affliction damage for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been dancing. Dance does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.
ItemDescription.LocalizedString: Hitting an enemy with this weapon has a small chance to cause it and nearby enemies to dance and take fire affliction damage for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been dancing. Dance does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.
